bookTitle: The Inner Game of Tennis: The Classic Guide to the Mental Side of Peak Performance
bookAuthors: W. Timothy Gallwey, Zach Kleinman, Pete Carroll
Plot: The Inner Game of Tennis is a revolutionary program for overcoming the self-doubt, nervousness, and lapses of concentration that can keep a player from winning. Now available in a revised paperback edition, this classic bestseller can change the way the game of tennis is played.
